David Plass wrote:

> In other words, do we EVER really need 'tearDown'?  I do see the need for
> setUp, especially if you need to construct (horror) interlinked mock
> objects.  But why bother 'nulling' out your locals? They'll be GC'ed anyway,
> right?

I consider the use of tearDown() a smell.
